text:
You are the Frontend Engineer on team easyrent-complete. Your task is to BUILD the IPAD Timeline (30-day Gantt view).

WORKING DIRECTORY: /home/sandriaas/_PROJECTS/easyrent/_apps/x-dashboard-0

TASK: Create apps/erp/src/components/schedules/ScheduleTimeline.tsx
- 30-day timeline/Gantt view for vehicle schedules
- One row per vehicle asset
- Bars showing reservations with status colors
- Pickup/dropoff info on hover
- Data sources: booking_reservations, vehicle_assets, booking_line_items, bookings

Also create:
- apps/erp/src/routes/ipad.tsx - Route page with the timeline
- Hook into sidebar navigation

Use existing calendar components as reference:
- apps/erp/src/components/calendar/ZoomControls.tsx
- apps/erp/src/components/calendar/CollapsibleResource.tsx
- apps/erp/src/stores/calendar-store.ts

Use context7 MCP to query React, TanStack Query, and date-fns documentation.
Use @easyrent/ui components (shadcn-based).

DO NOT STOP until the IPAD timeline is fully functional. Work autonomously.
